LanguageData.cantDetermineSides: 無法確定哪一側為外部。
LanguageData.ManualCommandNote: A colonist will come to perform the task.
LanguageData.CommandDesignateOpenCloseWindowDesc: 將此窗口設定為打開或關閉。不久就會有一個殖民者來執行這項任務。
LanguageData.CommandOpenCloseWindowLightDesc: 設定是否采光。不久就會有一個殖民者來執行這項任務。
LanguageData.CommandOpenCloseWindowVentDesc: 設定是否通風。不久就會有一個殖民者來執行這項任務。
LanguageData.CommandAutoVentilationDesc: Mark the window for opening or closing when room temperature becomes uncomfortable.
LanguageData.CantTrackTemperature: Adjacent room is unroofed, can't track temperature.
LanguageData.CommandCloseOnEmergencyDesc: Mark the window for closing when the emergency alarm is activated.
LanguageData.IndoorsNoNaturalLightPenaltyDesc: 當小人在室內但不在窗旁時，將會降低的戶外值。
LanguageData.LightTransmissionDesc: 外部光線能夠穿過玻璃和百葉的比例。現實中大約是90%。
LanguageData.ComfortableTemperatureDesc: The desired temperature range for the auto-ventilation function. The default is what the game considers the human comfort zone.
LanguageData.BeautySensitivityReductionDesc: 小人對窗外景觀的敏感度，以平衡「美麗的大自然」Mod中的相關設定。
LanguageData.BeautyFromBuildings: Add beauty from buildings when calculating a window's view.
LanguageData.BeautyFromBuildingsDesc: If checked, beauty from buildings in view (including sculptures) will also be added to the window beauty stat, alongside plants and other items.
LanguageData.LinkFridgesAndWalls: 與通風孔相連，顏色&「冰箱」Mod
LanguageData.AlarmReactDefault: Windows close on emergency by default
